scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel src --out-dir lib && browserify --entry lib/script.js --outfile jsvn.pkg.js && terser jsvn.pkg.js -o jsvn.min.js && del /f jsvn.pkg.js
scripts.build-demo: cross-env NODE_ENV=production babel tests/demo.es6 -o tests/demo.js && browserify --entry tests/demo.js --outfile tests/demo.pkg.js && terser tests/demo.pkg.js -o tests/demo.min.js && del /f tests\demo.pkg.js
